category.name: such that, with, pattern in one query

query.querystr: prog_line n1, n2; procedure p1, p2; assign a1, a2; variable v; constant c; Select a1 such that Modifies (a1, v) with v.varName = "x" pattern a1 (_, "y+5")
prog_line n1, n2; procedure p1, p2; assign a1, a2; variable v; constant c; Select p1 such that Calls (p1, p2) with p2.procName = "Orchid" pattern a1 ("y", _)
assign a1, a2; stmt s1, s2; Select s1 such that Parent (s1, a2) with a2.stmt# = 10 pattern a2 (_, "x + z")
stmt s1, s2; variable v; assign a1, a2; Select a1 such that Uses (a1, "idx") with a1.stmt# = 16 pattern a1 (_, _)
stmt s1, s2; assign a1, a2; variable v; procedure p1, p2; Select v such that Uses (p1, v) with p1.procName = "Orchid" pattern a1 (_, "idx - 1")
stmt s1, s2; while w1, w2; if i1, i2; Select w1 such that Uses (w1, "idx") and Uses (w2, "idx") and Parent (w1, i1) with w1.stmt# = w2.stmt# pattern w2 ("idx", _)
stmt s1, s2; while w1, w2; if i1, i2; Select i1 such that Uses (w1, "idx") and Uses (w2, "idx") and Parent (w1, i1) with w1. stmt# = w2.stmt# pattern i1 ("idx", _, _)
stmt s1, s2; while w1, w2; if i1, i2; Select i1 such that Uses (w1, "idx") and Uses (w2, "idx") and Parent (w1, i1) with w1.stmt# = w2.stmt# pattern i1 ("y", _, _)
stmt s1, s2; assign a1, a2; while w1, w2; if i1, i2; Select s2 such that Modifies (a1, "x") and Modifies (s2, "y") and Uses (s2, "x") with a1.stmt# = 2 pattern a1 ("x", _)
stmt s1, s2; assign a1, a2; while w1, w2; if i1, i2; Select such that Parent (w1, s2) and Next (s1, s2) with s1.stmt# = s2.stmt# pattern w1(_, _)
stmt s1, s2; assign a1, a2; Select s1 such that Modifies (s1, "y") and Modifies (a1, "x") with a1.stmt# = 2 pattern a1 ("x", _)
while w1, w2; stmt s1, s2; assign a1, a2; procedure p; Select w1 such that Parent (w1, s2) and Next (a1, s2) and Parent (w1, a1) with p.procName = "Orchid" pattern w1 ("idx", _)
while w1, w2; stmt s1, s2; assign a1, a2; procedure p; Select a1 such that Parent (w1, s2) and Next (a1, s2) and Parent (w1, a1) with p.procName = "Orchid" pattern w1 ("idx", _)
